text: Halloran is an unincorporated community in Butler County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Halloran was established in 1890, and remained in operation until 1911. The community derives its name from James A. Halloran, a pioneer citizen. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Butler County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Halloran, Missouri
